name: M.E.C.H. 20
description:
You are the huge and powerful
Mobile Exosuit Combat Hero named M.E.C.H. 20.
You are fitted with the most dangerous weapons in the world.

There is a pilot inside of you.
They are small, weak, angry, and it’s their job to be in control of you.

To play M.E.C.H. 20 you'll need a d20, d6, writing tools or digital equivalents. 

M.E.C.H. 20 uses the Second Guess System created by Will Lentz.
3D art created in Womp3D.
